The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to my point of view is a pretty traditional one, with one monolith whose character is pratically without flaws. No shades, that make fantasy even more amazing.
